Fighters.Name: Sinbad
Fighters.Text:
7 VOYAGES
When you maneuver, you may move your fighters +1 space for each VOYAGE card in your discard pile.

Fighters.Name: The Porter
Fighters.Text:
7 VOYAGES
When you maneuver, you may move your fighters +1 space for each VOYAGE card in your discard pile.

Card.Name: Toil and Danger
Card.Text: After combat: Move Sinbad up to 3 spaces.

Card.Name: Voyage Home
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Take all other VOYAGE cards from your discard pile and add them to your hand.

Card.Name: Voyage to the Island That Was a Whale
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the Island That Was a Whale
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Sinbad recovers 2 health.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the Island That Was a Whale.lua

Card.Name: Voyage to the Valley of the Giant Snakes
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the Valley of the Giant Snakes
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Look at your opponent's hand.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the Valley of the Giant Snakes.lua

Card.Name: Voyage to the Creature With Eyes Like Coals of Fire
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the Creature With Eyes Like Coals of Fire
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Your opponent discards 1 random card.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the Creature With Eyes Like Coals of Fire.lua

Card.Name: Voyage to the Cannibals With the Root of Madness
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the Cannibals With the Root of Madness
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: You may move Sinbad up to 2 spaces.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the Cannibals With the Root of Madness.lua

Card.Name: Voyage to the City of the Man-Eating Apes
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the City of the Man-Eating Apes
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the City of the Man-Eating Apes.lua

Card.Name: Voyage to the City of the King of Serendib
Card.Key: Sinbad_Voyage to the City of the King of Serendib
Card.Text:
During combat: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
After combat: Draw 1 card.
Card.Script: ../Sinbad/Voyage to the City of the King of Serendib.lua

Card.Name: Leap Away
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 4 spaces.

Card.Name: Momentous Shift
Card.Text: During combat: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.

Card.Name: Feint
Card.Text: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Regroup
Card.Text: After combat: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.
